heading: NASAT  |2014 | 7 | 21 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: "Super" versions of these structures are proposed to have caused huge increases in juvenile crust production rate. For 10 points each:  [10] Identify these large structures that may stretch all the way from the D double prime layer and are hypothesized to be the cause of hotspots away from plate boundaries.
